# removeItems(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the items at the specified indexes from the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeItems(at indexes: IndexSet)
```

## Parameters

- **indexes**: An index set ([doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/IndexSet]) of the indexes of the items to remove.

## Inserting, moving, and deleting items

- **insertItems(at:)**: Inserts new items at the specified indexes into the scrubber.
- **moveItem(at:to:)**: Moves an item from one index to another in the scrubber.
